   contain the root `toctree` directive.


Welcome to libTLDA's documentation!
===================================

libTLDA is a library of transfer learners and domain-adaptive classifiers. 
It is designed to give researchers and engineers an oppportunity to quickly test a number of classifiers.

More information will be added.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3

   installation.rst
   classifiers.rst
   examples.rst
   contact.rst
